summary: Several requests I did from the nexus request mod forum.
descriptionHtml:
[b] Silver Bow and Arrows[/b]
[url=http://modgames.net/load/248-1-0-12168]Russian Translation[/url] - thanks to Eriko :)

	Description
By request of BrokenSwords in this thread, this mod adds a silver bow and arrows, both craftable and lootable from the silver hands you encounter during the compagnions questline. 
The bow has about the same strength as steel and the more damage to undead perk. It is craftable with 1 silver ignot and 2 leather strips, and tempered with 1 silver ignot. 
The arrows are also about steel strength, and craftable with 1 silver ignot and 1 firewood for 10 arrows. They do not have the more damage to undead perk, because I couldn\'t add a script to arrows. The box simply isn\'t there in the editor.
Both the bow and the arrows have either a light or dark texture, see the screenshots for reference and read the installation instructions.

	Compability/ issues
No known issues.
Should be compitable with almost anything, except with mods that change the SilverHandMissile NPC. Those issues can be solved with wrye bash.
If any compability issues or bugs are encountered, please send me a pm or post a comment.

	Permissions
Feel free to use these textures in your own mods, as long as you do not simply copy my mod and give me credit.  Please do not upload to other sites without my permission.

[b]Outlander Sword[/b]
Description
Adds a new sword from a movie called Outlander. It\'s craftable with 1 iron, 2 steel, and 1 quicksilver. You can temper it using 1 steel. Have fun.

No known issues.

Feel free to use these assets in your own mods, as long as you do not simply copy my mod and give me credit.  Please do not upload to other sites without my permission.
author: FakePersonality
